SQL.LOAD: SELECT cis.claim_issue_id, cis.claim_issue_status_c_id, cis.comments, cis.created_by, cis.created_date, cis.modified_by, cis.modified_date, cis.claim_issue_status_id, eup.user_name created_by_name, cis.issue_process_reason_id FROM elp_claim_issue_status cis inner join elp_user eup on eup.network_id = cis.created_by WHERE cis.claim_issue_status_id = :claim_issue_status_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT cis.claim_issue_id, cis.claim_issue_status_c_id, cis.comments, cis.created_by, cis.created_date, cis.modified_by, cis.modified_date, cis.claim_issue_status_id, eup.user_name created_by_name, cis.issue_process_reason_id FROM elp_claim_issue_status cis inner join elp_user eup on eup.network_id = cis.created_by WHERE claim_issue_id = :claim_issue_id ORDER BY modified_date desc , created_date desc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_issue_status SET claim_issue_id = :claim_issue_id, claim_issue_status_c_id = :claim_issue_status_c_id, comments = :comments, modified_by = :modified_by, issue_process_reason_id = :issue_process_reason_id WHERE claim_issue_status_id = :claim_issue_status_id
